snippet: Young illegal immigrants can begin applying for work permits next week under a new government policy.
abstract: Young illegal immigrants will soon be able to apply for work permits under a new government policy, allowing American employers to tap a generation of educated workers who have been confined until now to the shadowy corners of the economy; studies indicate that 140,000 illegal immigrants are currently enrolled in college, and an additional 80,000 already have college degrees.
lead_paragraph: Young illegal immigrants can begin applying for work permits next week under a new government policy.

headline.seo: Illegal Immigrants See Opportunity in Work Permit Rule
headline.main: Illegal Immigrants See Opportunity in New Rule
headline.print_headline: Illegal Immigrants See Opportunity in New Rule
